Record Edit Video Edit Image
XiaoShiPin is a prototype-level App developed by Tencent Video Cloud Team. It helps demonstrate a portfolio of Tencent Cloud video features, such as recording and editing video clips through video cloud SDK, uploading and publishing videos through COS service, and distributing videos by using VOD service.

Agree Disagree Failed: %s Done Change Profile Picture Successfully Privacy Policy I have read and agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy Terms of Use You must agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use first. Welcome to Tencent Cloud XiaoShiPin Welcome to Tencent Real-Time Communication. We will help you understand our collection, use, and storage of personal information through the . XiaoShiPin product is a short video playback and production function product provided by Tencent Cloud Computing (Beijing) Co., Ltd. (registered at the 35th floor of Tencent Building, Science and Technology Zhongyi Road, Maling Community, Yuehai Street, Nanshan District, Shenzhen). If you need a quick and concise understanding of how we collect your information, you can refer to the XiaoShiPin Privacy Policy Summary.\n1、When you register and log in to XiaoShiPin account, we will collect your login account, login password and other information; when you use video recording, sharing, beauty, editing and other functions, we will collect your network type, equipment manufacturer , device model, face information, operating system version number and other information; when you report an abnormal situation during use, we will collect your package name, version, process name and other information. We will only collect necessary user information based on your specific functional requirements for using our products and services. You can refer to the List of Collected Personal Information for a quick overview of how we collect and use your personal information.\n2、When you use functions such as video recording, editing, and playback, we may invoke your storage, camera, microphone, network, audio and other permissions. We will ask you for permission to use the permission on the first call, you have the right to deny or cancel the authorization.\n3、Some of our services may need to be provided by third parties. You can refer to XiaoShiPin Third-Party Information Sharing List to quickly understand the third-party shared information and third-party SDK.\n4、You can inquire, copy, correct, supplement, delete or withdraw your personal information, and we also provide you with a channel to cancel your account. You can quickly learn about your other rights as the subject of personal information rights through the channels and methods listed in Article 6 of the Guidelines for Privacy Protection of XiaoShiPin. \n5、If you have any questions about the above content, you can contact us by sending an email to Dataprivacy@tencent.com or other methods listed in XiaoShiPin Privacy Protection Guidelines. If you agree to the XiaoShiPin User Agreement, XiaoShiPin Privacy Protection Guidelines, XiaoShiPin Collection Personal Information Express List, XiaoShiPin Third Party Information Sharing List and Children\'s Privacy Protection Statement, please click Agree , start using our products and services.
